page.syntax: C ftp_put_file_modal(C address ,C user ,C password ,C source_file ,C destination_file )

argument.name: address
argument.description: The FTP address of the transmission. Character

argument.name: destination_file
argument.description: The file to save remotely. Character

page.description: Transfers a file using FTP. Calling script pauses till tranfer is complete.
page.discussion: The FTP_PUT_FILE() function sends a file in the foreground over a FTP connection. Limitations: Desktop applicatons only.
